description: For use with MSR® canister stoves, the fuel is clean-burning, 80/20 blend of Isobutane and propane. The 110-gram canister has a narrow diameter that fits inside 1L Reactor pots and most solo-sized pots.Fuel maintains pressure from 55psi per gram down to 30psi per gram, so it functions well even as the canister empties.Self-sealing Lindal valve.Canister fits inside most individual sized pots.Contains 110g of fuel.
name: MSR Isopro Fuel Canister
